headline: DeSantis veto of anti-solar bill a win for Florida, big loss for FPL and legislative lackeys | Commentary
author: Scott Maxwell
sentences: In doing so, DeSantis delivered a big blow to a powerful interest, Florida Power & Light, that literally wrote the bill and then gave campaign money to the legislators who sponsored it.
As a guy who often feels like the grim reaper of news, delivering dark and depressing stories about Florida politics, Im pleased today to offer something sunnier.
It was good news for clean energy, solar customers, newspapers, good-government advocates and citizens sick of special-interest control.
Ron DeSantis vetoed a bill that was meant to thwart solar energy in the Sunshine State.
